title: High Interest Payment Burden
description: In 2023, Sri Lanka's interest payments constituted 79.87% of its revenue and 49.44% of its expenses, indicating a significant financial strain.

title: Decline in Stock Market Performance
description: Sri Lanka's stock market saw a dramatic decline of 62.44% in 2022, reflecting economic challenges and investor concerns.

title: Exemplary Exclusive Breastfeeding Rates
description: In 2016, 80.93% of Sri Lankan children under 6 months were exclusively breastfed, showcasing strong maternal and child health practices.

title: Low Prevalence of Overweight in Young Children
description: As of 2024, only 0.5% of Sri Lankan children under 5 were overweight, indicating effective nutritional policies for young children.
